name: UpdatePostalMailRecord
description:
Update a postal mail record in HubSpot CRM.

Use this tool to update an existing postal mail record in HubSpot CRM by specifying the postalMailId of the record to be updated.

parameters.name: postal_mail_id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the postal mail record to be updated in HubSpot CRM.

parameters.name: postal_mail_update_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing key-value pairs of the postal mail properties to update.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

parameters.name: property_identifier
parameters.description: Specify the property key of the postal mail record to identify which field to update. This is typically the name of the field in the CRM record.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
